### From studying life beneath the waves to creating connections above them
Welcome!

Here you will find my links to my publications, social networks, side projects, and occasional blog posts about my journey from studying coastal-marine communities to foster  engagement, connection, and collaboration within social communities. Feel free to contact me in case of any inquiry!
